verses.verse: The <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8334>ministered<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5941>Eli.<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H3368>precious<s%> in those <S%H3117>days;<s%> there was no <S%H6555>frequent<s%> <S%H2377>vision.<s%>

It happened at that <S%H3117>time,<s%> when <S%H5941>Eli<s%> was laid <S%H7901>down<s%> in his <S%H4725>place<s%> (now his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> had <S%H2490>begun<s%> to grow <S%H3544>dim,<s%> so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%>),

and the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3518>hadn't<s%> yet gone out, and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had laid <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> where the <S%H727>ark<s%> of God <S%H430>was;<s%>
that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H7323>ran<s%> to <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here <S%H2009>I<s%> <S%H559>am;<s%> for you called me." He said, <S%H2009>"I<s%> <S%H7121>didn't<s%> call; lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>" He <S%H3212>went<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> yet <S%H3254>again,<s%> <S%H8050>"Samuel!<s%>" <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I <S%H7121>am;<s%> for you called <S%H559>me.<s%>" He answered, "I <S%H7121>didn't<s%> call, my <S%H1121>son;<s%> lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>"
Now <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H2962>didn't<s%> yet <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> yet revealed to <S%H1540>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the third <S%H7992>time.<s%> He <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I <S%H7121>am;<s%> for you called <S%H5941>me.<s%>" Eli <S%H995>perceived<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5288>child.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> lie <S%H7901>down:<s%> and it shall <S%H7121>be,<s%> if he calls <S%H559>you,<s%> that you shall say, <S%H1696><s%> 'Speak, <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8085>hears.<s%>'" So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down<s%> in his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3320>stood,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> <S%H8050>"Samuel!<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel!<s%>" Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>"Speak;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H8085>hears.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H6213>"Behold,<s%> I will do a <S%H1697>thing<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> at which <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H241>ears<s%> of everyone who <S%H8085>hears<s%> it shall <S%H6750>tingle.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> against <S%H5941>Eli<s%> all that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> from the <S%H2490>beginning<s%> even to the <S%H3615>end.<s%>

For I have <S%H5046>told<s%> him that I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> which he <S%H3045>knew,<s%> because his <S%H1121>sons<s%> brought a <S%H7043>curse<s%> on <S%H3543>themselves,<s%> and he didn't restrain them.

Therefore I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> that the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall not be <S%H3722>removed<s%> with <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> nor <S%H2077%H99999>offering<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H5941>Eli<s%> the <S%H4759>vision.<s%>
Then <S%H5941>Eli<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8050>"Samuel,<s%> my <S%H1121>son!<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "What is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H3582>you?<s%> Please don't hide it from <S%H430>me.<s%> God do <S%H6213>so<s%> to <S%H3254>you,<s%> and more also, if you <S%H3582>hide<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> from me of all the <S%H1697>things<s%> that he spoke to <S%H1696>you.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him every <S%H1697>bit,<s%> and <S%H3582>hid<s%> nothing from <S%H559>him.<s%> He said, "It is <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Let him <S%H6213>do<s%> what <S%H5869>seems<s%> good to <S%H2896>him.<s%>"
<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H1697>him,<s%> and let none of his words <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
All <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H539>established<s%> to be a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1540>revealed<s%> himself to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
